metadata.title: CVE-2024-24148 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A memory leak issue discovered in parseSWF_FREECHARACTER in libming v0.4.8allows attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted SWF file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
